    • SetEmotionValue

      public static Emotions SetEmotionValue(Enums.EMOTION emotion, String value, Emotions obj)
      This function is used to set the value of an emotion, in the range 0-5. • If the value is not in the range, the system returns an error. • If the value is in the range, the system sets the value of the emotion. And only if the operation is successful, the system saves this emotion into Database.
      Parameters:
      emotion - the emotion that the user wants to set.
      value - the value of the emotion to be set from zero to 5.
      obj - the object that contains all useful information about the emotion.
      Returns:
      the object that contains all useful information about the emotion.

    • CheckEmotionValueRange

      public static boolean CheckEmotionValueRange()

    • ShowSummaryEmot

      public static String[] ShowSummaryEmot(Song song, List<Emotions> emotions_list) throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      This method is used to print the summary of a song. If the song searched doesn't have any registration, the system return an error.
      Parameters:
      song - the song to be printed the emotion.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class is not found.
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • SumArray

      private static float[] SumArray(float[] arr, float[] inpArr)
      This function is used to calculate the average of emotion values of a song.
      Parameters:
      arr - the array of values to be summed.
      inpArr - the array of values to be summed.
      Returns:
      the array of summed values.

    • NumberRounder

      private static String[] NumberRounder(float[] numbers)
      This function is used to take as input param a float array, to round values in it.
      Parameters:
      numbers - input float array to be rounded.
      Returns:
      a String array with rounded values to be print.
